params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The device registry path. Required. For example, projects/my-project/locations/us-central1/registries/my-registry.

params.name: data.device_num_ids
params.description: A list of device numeric IDs. If empty, this field is ignored. Maximum IDs: 10,000.

params.name: data.device_ids
params.description: A list of device string IDs. For example, ['device0', 'device12']. If empty, this field is ignored. Maximum IDs: 10,000

params.name: data.field_mask
params.description: The fields of the Device resource to be returned in the response. The fields id and num_id are always returned, along with any other fields specified.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: The maximum number of devices to return in the response. If this value is zero, the service will select a default size. A call may return fewer objects than requested. A non-empty next_page_token in the response indicates that more data is available.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: The value returned by the last ListDevicesResponse; indicates that this is a continuation of a prior ListDevices call and the system should return the next page of data.
